title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Designing Interactive English Learning via Video Conferencing for Taiwanese EFL Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level English Grammar and Vocabulary Comprehension
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can practice math-related English expressions by interacting with native speakers at least three times via video conferencing.
Learners can create videos explaining math problem-solving processes in English for project-based assessments.
Learners can report learning motivation and confidence improvements of 4.0/5.0 or higher in post-video-conference surveys.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
